abstract.p: Correction of September 24 item about building meditation labyrinth on East 136th Street in Bronx; Friends Inc social service agency is (S)

block.p: An article in the Neighborhood Report pages on Sept. 24 about building a labyrinth as a site for meditation on East 136th Street in the Bronx referred incorrectly to Friends Inc., the social service agency that commissioned it. The group is independent and nonprofit, not a project of the Visiting Nurse Service, which provides Friends with a crisis intervention team. The article also referred misstated the involvement of Katherine G. Levine. She is the director of that team, not a director of Friends.

An article in the Neighborhood Report pages on Sept. 24 about building a labyrinth as a site for meditation on East 136th Street in the Bronx referred incorrectly to Friends Inc., the social service agency that commissioned it. The group is independent and nonprofit, not a project of the Visiting Nurse Service, which provides Friends with a crisis intervention team. The article also referred misstated the involvement of Katherine G. Levine. She is the director of that team, not a director of Friends.
